After doing this, her Will points becomes 0, she is placed Prone, and no longer benefits from her The Lady of Lorien or War Aspect special rules (and thus becomes Unarmed).

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sebastian
active_or_passive_rules.description: During a Combat, Radagast may roll an additional D6 in the Duel roll, and an additional Strike if he wins, with Strength 1. This additional Strike cannot be modified by Might.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master of Birds
active_or_passive_rules.description: Radagast always has Line of Sight to any point on the battlefield. Friendly Eagle models within 12" of Radagast gain Resistant to Magic.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Voice of Curunir
active_or_passive_rules.description: Saruman's Stand Fast! Range is 12", and affects Hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Consuming Rivalry
active_or_passive_rules.description: Saruman may never benefit from a friendly Gandalf the Grey's Heroic Actions or targeted by his Magical Powers.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the Istari
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of each Move Phase, before the Declare Heroic Actions step, Saruman may choose an enemy within 6" and Line of Sight, which must take an Intelligence test. If failed, that model cannot Activate this turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Shattered Spirit
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the Move Phase, before the Declare Heroic Actions Step, Thrain must take an Intelligence Test. If the test is passed, Thrain acts normally during the turn. If the test is passed on a double (i.e., both dice show the same score) then until the end of the turn, Thrain increases his Attacks to 3, his Strength to 4, and gains the Fearless special rule. If the test is failed, then the opposing player controls Thrain as if he was one of their models, and will Activate Thrain during their own Activation Phase. Though he is being controlled by the opposing player, Thrain cannot be targeted with shooting attacks, Magical Powers or special rules that affect enemy models. Additionally, if Thrain was a Good model, then other Good models cannot make Strikes against him should they beat him in a Combat or make Shooting Attacks if he would be In The Way as with any other Good model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Gandalf's Intervention
active_or_passive_rules.description: If when Thrain takes his Intelligence Test for his Shattered Spirit special rule he is within 3" of a friendly Gandalf the Grey, then he may alter a single dice rolled as part of his Intelligence Test by 1, either up or down. If after this alteration the score of the Intelligence Test is a double, then Thrain may gain the benefits of rolling a double as described in his Shattered Spirit special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Easterling Halberd
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon can be used as either a pike or two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Infantry model with this rule loses a Combat, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Easterling Halberd
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon can be used as either a pike or two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Infantry model with this rule loses a Combat, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Orcish Brawler
active_or_passive_rules.description: If outnumbered in a Combat, Gorbag gains +1 to his Attack value for the duration of the Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Adaptive Fighter
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Gorbah wins a Duel Roll, he may choose an enemy model involved in the Combat, and that model must back away in a direction chosen by Gorbag. For example, they may be forced to back away over the edge of cliff, and take fall damage. Other models then back away as normal and Strikes are resolved.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Gothmog's Right Hand
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Gothmog's Enforcer is within 3" of Gothmog, then Gothmog may spend one of Gothmog's Enforcer's Will points to declare a Heroic Move or Heroic March, instead of spending his own Might points. Additionally, when Gothmog declares a Heroic March or Heroic Move within 3" of Gothmog's Enforcer, Gothmog can measure the range of the With Me or At the Double from Gothmog's Enforcer, rather than himself.

active_or_passive_rules.name: "The time of the Orc has come"
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per game, at the start of any Fight phase, all friendly Mordor Orc models within 12" may re-roll failed To Wound rolls when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: "The Age of Men is Over"
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Mordor Orc models within 3" gain the Hatred (Man) special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master of Reserves
active_or_passive_rules.description: In Scenarios where you roll for Warbands to arrive, even if Guritz is not on the battlefield, you may modify the roll for Guritz' Warband by +1 or -1. If he is already on the battlefield, you may modify the roll for other Warbands in your army.

active_or_passive_rules.name: End the Race of Man
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst Engaged in Combat with an enemy Man model, Guritz gains a +1 bonus to his Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: End the Race of Man
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst Engaged in Combat with an enemy Man model, this model gains a +1 bonus to his Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: End the Race of Man
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst Engaged in Combat with an enemy Man model, this model gains a +1 bonus to his Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Whip of the Masters
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each time a friendly Hero model within 6" attempts a Heroic Move, Heroic March or Heroic Shoot, roll a D6. On a 4+, that action is free for that Hero.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Cleaving Blow
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model rolls a natural 6 To Wound, and the Wound is successful, the target suffers 2 Wounds rather than 1.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Cleaving Blow
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model rolls a natural 6 To Wound, and the Wound is successful, the target suffers 2 Wounds rather than 1.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Troll Loader
active_or_passive_rules.description: May re-roll the To Hit roll if the Siege Troll is one of the models firing the catapult this turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Area Effect
active_or_passive_rules.description: After rolling To Hit against a Battlefield Target, all other models within 2" of them suffer a Strength 5 and will be knocked Prone.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wall-breaker
active_or_passive_rules.description: When rolling To Wound against a Siege Target, make two To Wound rolls and pick the highest. Also, a successful To Wound roll against a Siege Target will do D3 Wounds rather than 1.

additional_text: Crewed by three Mordor Orc Siege Crew, one of which is the Siege Veteran, and a Mordor Siege Troll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sense of Impending Doom
active_or_passive_rules.description: Enemy models within 6" of the Mouth of Sauron cannot re-roll 1s in the Duel Roll, regardless of special rules that would normally allow them to do so.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Morgul Blade
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per game, direct all attacks against one model, and if they suffer at least one wound that is not prevented by Fate, they are instantly killed.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Hands off the shiny shirt, that's mine!
active_or_passive_rules.description: During a Scenario that involves picking up and carrying Objectives, and during his Move, Shagrat can choose a friendly model within 3" who is carrying an Objective and take an Intelligence test. If passed, he gains possession of the Objective, even if not normally allowed to be passed. He can also carry multiple Objectives, even if the Scenario normally doesn't allow for it.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Cleaving Blow
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model rolls a natural 6 To Wound, and the Wound is successful, the target suffers 2 Wounds rather than 1.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lone Hunter
active_or_passive_rules.description: Shelob may never be taken as part of another model's Warband, or benefit from the Heroic Actions of other models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: She is always hungry
active_or_passive_rules.description: If not Engagement in Combat at the start of her Activation, Shelob can kill a friendly model within 1". If she does, until the end of that turn, she may re-roll one dice in any Duel roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: She hungers for sweeter meats
active_or_passive_rules.description: Shelob gains +1 Attack whilst Engaged in Combat with an enemy Man, Elf Dwarf or Hobbit model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Caught in a Web
active_or_passive_rules.description: Shelob can choose to direct a single strike at one model in the Combat. That model suffers one Strength 8 hit, and if it survives, the model is treated as being under the effect of the Paralyse magical power. The model will also not automatically recover if Shelob is slain, leaves the board, or reduced to zero Will points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: A Fell Light is in Them
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the end of spectre's move, it can choose an enemy model within 12" and in Line of Sight. The model must pass an Intelligence test. If failed, you may move that model directly towards the spectre, up to its maximum Move value, even if it has already moved that turn. The model will stop moving if it would enter an enemy Control Zone (though they will never count as charging in this instance, and therefore cannot be involved in Combat with them), comes into contact with an Obstacle, impassable terrain, cliff edge, or another model. This cannot be used to move a model out of Combat, make them dismount, drop an item, or Lie Down. However this move can be used to make the model Charge the spectre. A model affected by this special rule cannot Move any further that turn, and may not use Active abilities.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lord of the Rings
active_or_passive_rules.description: Free point of Will to be spent each turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The One Ring
active_or_passive_rules.description: Roll a D6 each time Sauron loses his last Wound. On 2+, restore 1 Wound. May use Might to improve this roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Unstoppable!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can make one Strength 8 hit on all models involved in the Combat, including all supporting models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Flames of Evil
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can make a Strength 10 strike against one model. If they survive, they are Set Ablaze and knocked Prone.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Morgul Blade
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per game, direct all attacks against one model, and if they suffer at least one wound that is not prevented by Fate, they are instantly killed.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Crown of Morgul
active_or_passive_rules.description: Enemies within 6" or those who Charge the Witch-king cannot benefit from automatically passing Courage tests, except for Heroic Resolve. Also, once per game in a Fight phase, any model that suffers a Wound from the Witch-king is Set Ablaze.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Visage of Terror
active_or_passive_rules.description: If an enemy attempts to Charge this model and fails its Courage Test (due to Terror), then their Activation will immediately end rather than just not being able to Move than turn. They also cannot Shoot in the Shoot Phase, and cannot Move in the Fight Phase if part of a successful Heroic Combat, but may otherwise act normally.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Visage of Terror
active_or_passive_rules.description: If an enemy attempts to Charge this model and fails its Courage Test (due to Terror), then their Activation will immediately end rather than just not being able to Move than turn. They also cannot Shoot in the Shoot Phase, and cannot Move in the Fight Phase if part of a successful Heroic Combat, but may otherwise act normally.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Accurate
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Mordor Siege Bow will only Scatter 3" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Piercing Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: A model hit will be flung back D6" if it has a Strength of 5 or lower. Any models passed over are knocked prone and take a Strength 5 hit. The flung model stops if it hits impassable terrain or a model with Strength 6 or higher, and both take a Strength 6 hit. The flung model is knocked prone if it survives. If the flung model would end its  movement over other models, those models are moved the minimum distance to allow the flung model to be placed.

additional_text: Crewed by three Mordor Orc Siege Crew, one of which is the Siege Veteran.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Visage of Terror
active_or_passive_rules.description: If an enemy attempts to Charge this model and fails its Courage Test (due to Terror), then their Activation will immediately end rather than just not being able to Move than turn. They also cannot Shoot in the Shoot Phase, and cannot Move in the Fight Phase if part of a successful Heroic Combat, but may otherwise act normally.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Kingdoms of Men
active_or_passive_rules.description: A King off Dale's Stand Fast is 12", and also affects Dale Hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Ring of Barahir
active_or_passive_rules.description: When affected by a Magical Power, and after any resist tests, Aragorn may roll a D6. On a 6, he is not affected by that power.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Anduril, Flame of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven hand-and-a-half weapon, never needs more than a 4+ To Wound, or a 3+ if using Anduril as a two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: "Stand, Men of the West"
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly models treat Aragorn as a banner with a range of 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Horn of Gondor
active_or_passive_rules.description: A war horn, where if Boromir is outnumbered in a Combat, you may ask your opponent to choose one of their models involved, who must take a Courage test. If they fail, Boromir wins the Duel roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Banner of Minas Tirith
active_or_passive_rules.description: A banner with a range of 6". If a friendly Gondor Warrior model within range is involved in a Drawn Combat, and the Combat is tied at the Gondor Warriors' Fight value, they will automatically win (unless the enemy has the same special rule). Boromir does not suffer a -1 penalty in the Duel roll for carrying a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Son of Gondor
active_or_passive_rules.description: In a turn in which he Charges, Boromir gains a +1 bonus To Wound when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Well-aimed Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: When making a shooting attack, the first time Damrod fails an In The Way test he may make an Intelligence test. If passed, the In The Way roll will be successful instead.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Broken Mind
active_or_passive_rules.description: After Priority has been determined, Denethor must take an Intelligence test. If the test is failed, then Denethor is controlled by the opposing player, and may even Charge and fight models from his own Army. When Denethor is Activated by the opposing player he is still considered to be a friendly model, and so friendly models cannot target him with shooting attacks or Magical Powers that cause damage, and may not make Strikes against him if they beat him in a Combat. When under the control of the opposing player, they cannot use any of Denethor's Might, Will or Fate points. Even when under the control of the opposing player, Denethor always counts as a model in his controlling player's Army. If Boromir is part of the same Army, then Denethor will automatically pass this Intelligence test so long as Boromir is alive. However, should Boromir be slain, then Denethor will automatically fail the next Intelligence Test he has to make for this special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Narsil
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Master-forged two-handed weapon, and the model carrying this weapon may call a Heroic Combat each turn for free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: High King of Gondor and Arnor
active_or_passive_rules.description: The range of Elendil's Stand Fast is 12" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: "A Chance for Faramir, Captain of Gondor to show his Quality"
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Faramir's army is Broken, he may re-roll any failed To Wound rolls when making strikes, and declare a free Heroic Resolve each turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wizard's Pupil
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Faramir is alive and you choose to give Priority to your opponent, then Faramir and friendly Warrior models within 3" of him gain Dominant (2) until the end of the turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pippin
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst Pippin is Mounted, Gandalf gains Resistant to Magic, can re-roll natural 1s on To Wound rolls, and spend Pippin's Might, Will and Fate points - see pg.53 of Armies of LOTR for full details.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Glamdring
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven hand-and-a-half weapon. Gandalf's strength is 5 when making strikes with Glamdring.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Narya
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gandalf may re-roll any failed Fate rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Area Effect
active_or_passive_rules.description: After rolling To Hit against a Battlefield Target, all other models within 2" of them suffer a Strength 5 and will be knocked Prone.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wall-breaker
active_or_passive_rules.description: When rolling To Wound against a Siege Target, make two To Wound rolls and pick the highest. Also, a successful To Wound roll against a Siege Target will do D3 Wounds rather than 1.

additional_text: Crewed by three Minas Tirith Siege Crew, one of which is the Siege Veteran.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Protectors of the White Tree
active_or_passive_rules.description: If within 6" of a friendly Gondor General, this model gains Dominant (2).

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pennant of the Dead
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Dunharrow models within 3" gain Resistant to Magic.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The King's Counsel
active_or_passive_rules.description: If the King of the Dead is within 3", he may use this model's Will points to declare Heroic Actions, instead of using his own Might points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Defend the White City
active_or_passive_rules.description: Irolas may use the Shielding special rule, even without a shield. If he wins a Combat whilst Shielding, he may make a single Strike against one enemy model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Captain of the Citadel Guard
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Citadel Guard within 3" of Irolas gain +1 To Wound when making strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Shards of Narsil
active_or_passive_rules.description: If your army also contains Elendil and he is slain, place a 25mm marker where he was killed. If Isildur ends his Activation within 1" of this marker, he gains the Shards of Narsil. This is a hand weapon for which Isildur gains a bonus of +1 To Wound when making strikes in a Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Drain Soul
active_or_passive_rules.description: Any model that suffers a Wound from the King of the Dead, that is not prevented by Fate, is immediately killed.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Dead and the Living
active_or_passive_rules.description: Only friendly Dunharrow models may benefit from the King of the Dead's Stand Fast or Heroic Actions.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master of Reserves
active_or_passive_rules.description: In Scenarios where you roll for Warbands to arrive, even if Madril is not on the battlefield, you may modify the roll for Madril's Warband by +1 or -1. If he is already on the battlefield, you may modify the roll for other Warbands in your army.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Loyal to the Captains
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model is within 6" or Boromir or Faramir, they may re-roll To Wound rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chief of Lamedon
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Lamedon models within 3" of Angbor automatically pass any Courage Tests they are required to make.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Axe of Lossarnach
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon can be used as either a spear or two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: An Unlikely Friendship
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of a friendly Pippin, Beregond may re-roll any failed To Wound rolls when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dead-eye Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: When benefiting from a Heroic Shoot, this model may re-roll failed To Wound rolls when making shooting attacks.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pride of Dol Amroth
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of Prince Imrahil, this model gains a bonus of +1 Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Honour of Lamedon
active_or_passive_rules.description: Clansmen of Lamedon within 3" of a friendly Lamedon Hero model may re-roll any rolls of a natural 1 when making a Duel roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Go for the Eyes!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Duinhir may re-roll failed To Hit rolls when shooting an enemy Monster model. Also, if he successfully Wounds an enemy Monster with a shooting attack that is not prevented, it will deal D3 Wounds rather than 1.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the Blackroot Vale
active_or_passive_rules.description: Blackroot Vale Archers within 3" of Duinhir may re-roll To Hit rolls of 1 when making shooting attacks, as long as they didn't Move during the preceding Move phase.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Horn of Lossarnach
active_or_passive_rules.description: A war horn. Once per game at the beginning of his Activation, Forlong may use it to give friendly models within 12" of him the Terror special rule until the end of the turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of Lossarnach
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Lossarnach models within 3" may re-roll results of a natural 1 when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Swift Reload
active_or_passive_rules.description: AWhen firing the Bolt Thrower, you may roll two dice and pick the highest result when determining how many shots it may take.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Rapid Fire
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Bolt Thrower doesn't shoot like a normal Siege Engine. Instead, it may make D6 shoot attacks in the same way as a normal Missile Weapon. No Scatter is required for these shots, they will either hit or miss. Each shot may be fully resolved before determining the target of the next one. Shots fired by the Bolt Thrower do not kill their targets outright if they Wound them.

additional_text: Crewed by three Minas Tirith Siege Crew, one of which is the Siege Veteran.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Warden's Sword
active_or_passive_rules.description: Master Forged hand-and-a-half weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: In Defence of the King
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst Hurin is within 3" of your General, so long as your General has the Gondor keyword, Hurin automatically passes any Courage Tests he is required to make, and may re-roll To Wound rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lines of Command
active_or_passive_rules.description: Your opponent cannot score Victory Points for Wounding or slaying the enemy General, so long as Hurin is alive on the battlefield and your General has the Gondor keyword.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Resolute Fighter
active_or_passive_rules.description: Ingold and friendly Gondor Warrior models within 3" do not Back Away if they lose a Combat - their opponent must Back Away instead. However, this does not mean that a model benefiting from this rule cannot count as being Trapped, when they lose their Duel roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lineage of Numenor
active_or_passive_rules.description: The range of Prince Imrahil's Stand Fast is 12" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dol Amroth for Gondor!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Dol Amroth models treat Prince Imrahil as a banner with a range of 6"

active_or_passive_rules.name: Hadhafang
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven hand-and-a-half weapon, Arwen gains a bonus of +1 To Wound when making Strikes again a Spirit model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lord of Lorien
active_or_passive_rules.description: Celeborn gains a free Will point each turn. If it is not spent by the end of the turn, then the point is lost.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Battle Wisdom
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Lothlorien Warrior models within 3" of Celeborn gain a bonus of +1 To Wound when making Strikes.

additional_text: Any Galadhrim Warriors upgraded to Lorien Guard in Celeborn's warband may re-roll To Wound rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Shipwright's Power
active_or_passive_rules.description: Cirdan gains a free Will point at the start of each turn. If it is not spent by the end of the turn, it is lost.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Hadhafang
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven hand-and-a-half weapon, Elrond gains a bonus of +1 To Wound when making Strikes again a Spirit model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Vilya
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elrond may re-roll any failed Fate points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: May re-roll a single D6 in the Duel roll, as well as a single D6 in To Wound rolls when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Foresight of the Eldar
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the game before deployment, Elrond gains D6 Foresight points. As long as he is alive, Elrond can spend these points to increase his controlling player's Priority roll by 1 for each point spent, to a maximum of 6.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Nenya
active_or_passive_rules.description: Galadriel may re-roll any failed Fate rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lady of Lothlorien
active_or_passive_rules.description: Galadriel gains a free Will point each turn. If it is not spent by the end of the turn, then the point is lost.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mirror of Galadriel
active_or_passive_rules.description: Heavy object on a 40mm base, with Defence 8 and Wounds 3. Deployed within 6" of Galadriel. During Priority, if Galadriel or Celeborn are in base contact with it, the controlling player may add 1 to their Priority roll. Additionally, during the End phase of each turn, one friendly Hero within 6" of the Mirror may restore Fate points to their starting value.

additional_text: Any Galadhrim Warriors upgraded to Lorien Guard in Galadriel's warband may re-roll To Wound rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Aiglos
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven spear, and a model wielding Aiglos gains a bonus of +1 To Wound when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: High King of the Elves
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gil-galad's Stand Fast is 12", and friendly Elf Hero models may also benefit from it.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: May re-roll a single D6 in the Duel roll, as well as a single D6 in To Wound rolls when making Strikes.

additional_text: Any Rivendell Warriors upgraded to King's Guard in Gil-Galad's warband will have a Fight value of 6.

active_or_passive_rules.name: One Final Blow
active_or_passive_rules.description: When slain in Combat, Haldir can make a Strength 4 Strike against all enemy models he was in Combat with. He may also use Might to increase the To Wound rolls as normal.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Song of Elbereth
active_or_passive_rules.description: All friendly Rivendell models within 3" of Lindir gain the Resistant to Magic special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wise Council
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Lindir is within 6" of Elrond, then Elrond may spend a single point of Will each turn for free. If he does not use this point by the end of the turn, then it is lost.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wood Elf spear
active_or_passive_rules.description: An Elven spear, and this model may use the Shielding rule even if they do not have a shield.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Orcrist
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven hand-and-a-half weapon, with Orcbane, Goblinbane and Uruk-haibane, Terror (Goblin), Terror (Orc) and Terror (Uruk-hai) special rules.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Deadly Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: Legolas can make three shooting attacks during the Shoot Phase. He can still shoot whilst Engaged in Combat, and does not suffer the -1 penalty To Hit for Moving and Shooting, as long as he has the Infantry keyword. He can also shoot at models he in Engaged in Combat with, requiring no In The Way tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pinpoint Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: Legolas can make a single shot against an enemy Engaged in Combat with himself or a friendly model. If the To Hit roll is successful, he doesn't need to make any In The Way rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Elven Glaive
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven spear, when Engaged in Combat and not being Supported, this model may either gain a bonus of +1 Attack for the Duel roll or +1 Attack when making Strikes. This must be decided before the Duel roll takes place.

active_or_passive_rules.name: King's Knights
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst they have the Cavalry model, this model gains a bonus of +1 Fight and +1 Defence whilst within 6" of Thranduil.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Elven Glaive
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven spear, when Engaged in Combat and not being Supported, this model may either gain a bonus of +1 Attack for the Duel roll or +1 Attack when making Strikes. This must be decided before the Duel roll takes place.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Knife Fighters
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Outnumbered in Combat, then before making their Duel roll, this model gains +1 Attack for each model they are Engaged in Combat with, after the first, up to the a maximum of 3 bonus Attacks. This bonus lasts until the end of the Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Knife Fighters
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Outnumbered in Combat, then before making their Duel roll, this model gains +1 Attack for each model they are Engaged in Combat with, after the first, up to the a maximum of 3 bonus Attacks. This bonus lasts until the end of the Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: King's Guard
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of Thranduil, this model gains a bonus of +1 to their Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: King's Guard
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of Thranduil, this model gains a bonus of +1 to their Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Blade Mistress
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Outnumbered in Combat, then before making her Duel roll, Tauriel gains +1 Attack for each model she is Engaged in Combat with, after the first. This bonus lasts until the end of the Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Vengeful Fury
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Kili is in your army and killed, Tauriel gains Strength 5 and is reduced to Defence 4 for the remainder of the battle. Additionally, if Kili is killed, Tauriel must always Charge an enemy model when she Activates if possible.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Bladelord
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Outnumbered in a Combat, Thranduil may re-roll To Wound Rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes. If he has the Infantry keyword, Thranduil may instead re-roll all failed To Wound Rolls when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Fury of the Elvenking
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Outnumbered in a Combat, and successfully kills all enemy models that he was Engaged in Combat with, then in the following turn Thranduil may declare a Heroic Combat for free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: "Do not talk to me of Dragon fire"
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the beginning of his Activation, Thranduil can spend a Will Point. If he does, then until the end of the turn Thranduil gains Terror. Additionally, if Thranduil has the Infantry keyword, then each enemy model within 3" of him, that is not Engaged in Combat, must take a Courage Test in an order chosen by Thranduil's controlling player. If the test is failed, they must immediately Move directly away from Thranduil as far as they can, up to the limit of their Move Value. Models Moved by this special rule cannot Move again during the turn, but may otherwise act normally.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Unbreakable Bond
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Elrohir is slain, make a note of the model that killed him. Elladan increases his Strength by 1 for the remainder of the game, and must always Charge an enemy if able to do so, prioritising the enemy who killed Elrohir. If Elladan is Engaged in Combat with the model that killed Elrohir, and that model is a Hero, he may declare a free Heroic Challenge, regardless of the Hero's Heroic Tier.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Twin Elven Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst he has the Infantry keyword, Elladan can choose one of three bonuses at the start of a Combat: Gain 3 Attacks rather than 2, use the Shielding rule, or use his Elven weapons as Elven hand-and-a-half weapons.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Strength of Brotherhood
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of Elrohir, Elladan gains Dominant (2) and may re-roll To Wound rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Unbreakable Bond
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Elrohir is slain, make a note of the model that killed him. Elladan increases his Strength by 1 for the remainder of the game, and must always Charge an enemy if able to do so, prioritising the enemy who killed Elrohir. If Elladan is Engaged in Combat with the model that killed Elrohir, and that model is a Hero, he may declare a free Heroic Challenge, regardless of the Hero's Heroic Tier.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Twin Elven Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst he has the Infantry keyword, Elladan can choose one of three bonuses at the start of a Combat: Gain 3 Attacks rather than 2, use the Shielding rule, or use his Elven weapons as Elven hand-and-a-half weapons.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Strength of Brotherhood
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of Elrohir, Elladan gains Dominant (2) and may re-roll To Wound rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Caras Galadhon Fighting Style
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model may use the Shielding rule with their Elven pike. The usual restrictions for Shielding still apply, chiefly that a model using the Shielding rule cannot be Supported by another model, not even by another Guard of the Galadhrim Court.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Whirl of Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Orophin rolls a natural 6 in the Duel roll, then he will make double the number of strikes he normally would when rolling To Wound. Note that if the model he is fighting is Trapped, these Strikes will not also gain the benefit for Striking a Trapped model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Swift Parry
active_or_passive_rules.description: Rumil may force one enemy model involved in the same Combat as him to re-roll one D6 in their Duel roll. This must be done before all other re-rolls, and before any Might points are spent.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Enchanting Song
active_or_passive_rules.description:
During their Activation, a Sentinel may sing one of the following songs:
The Hymn of Elbereth - Choose a friendly model within 12", who will  automatically pass all Courage Tests until the End Phase of the turn.
Eldamar Madrigal - Choose an enemy model within 12" who is not Engaged in Combat. They must take an Intelligence Test. If failed, you may immediately Move that model. However you cannot make them enter an enemy model’s Control Zone, dismount, lie down, be forced to Climb, Jump, Leap or Swim, or Move in any way that would cause direct harm. The model affected by this song cannot be Activated later in the turn.
The Lay of Gondolin - Sentinel and all friendly models within 3" gain Terror until the End Phase of the turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dunlending Heritage
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Dunland Warrior models within 6" of Freca gain a bonus of +1 to their Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Claim the Throne
active_or_passive_rules.description: If the enemy General is removed as a casualty whilst within 6" of Freca, then for the duration of the battle, friendly Dunland models treat Freca as a banner with range 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dunlending Commander
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst alive on the battlefield, if you win the Priority roll and give Priority to your opponent, then friendly Dunlending Warrior models within 6" of General Targg may re-roll To Wound rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes, until the end of the turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Flaming Brand
active_or_passive_rules.description: A model with a Flaming Brand has the Terror (Cavalry) and Terror (Beast) special rules. Additionally, this model counts as 2 models rather than 1 when working out how many models are within range of an objective marker.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Traitor of Rohan
active_or_passive_rules.description: Lord Thorne may only include Rohirrim Traitors in his Warband.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Edoras Shall Fall
active_or_passive_rules.description: During the Fight phase, friendly Rohirrim Traitors within 6" of Lord Thorne gain a bonus of +1 to their Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Spear Mastery
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model may use its throwing spears as a normal spear during the Fight phase, as long as it hasn't made a shooting attack with it in the Move or Shoot phase.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Orcish Halberd
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can be used as either a spear or two-handed weapon. Shank may re-roll failed To Wound rolls when making Strikes against a Trapped model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Loot the Bodies
active_or_passive_rules.description: When Shank or Wrot slay a model, roll a D6. On a natural 6, they have found a trinket. At the end of the game, as long as of them is alive, you gain a Victory Point for each trinket found, to a maximum of 5 points. Your total Victory Points can not exceed 20.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Call 'the Beast'
active_or_passive_rules.description: Shank may spend a Will point at the start of his activation. If the Snow Troll is within 6" not Engaged in Combat, it must Charge if possible, gains Fearless, and may re-roll failed To Wound rolls when making Strikes, until the end of this turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Tasty Fingers
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whenever Wrot slays an enemy model in Combat, he may roll a D6. On a 4+, he immediately regains either a Wound or Fate point spent earlier in the battle.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Loot the Bodies
active_or_passive_rules.description: When Shank or Wrot slay a model, roll a D6. On a natural 6, they have found a trinket. At the end of the game, as long as of them is alive, you gain a Victory Point for each trinket found, to a maximum of 5 points. Your total Victory Points can not exceed 20.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Horned Charge
active_or_passive_rules.description: During a turn in which a Snow Troll Charges, it gains a bonus of +1 Attack and +1 Fight value until the end of the turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Usurper King
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Engaged in Combat with an enemy Hero, Wulf may re-roll a single D6 during the Duel roll. Additionally, Wulf must re-roll To Wound rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes against an enemy hero.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Keep 'em for Later
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model wins a Duel Roll, they may choose a single enemy model on a 25mm base instead of making Strikes or using a Brutal Power Attack. The chosen model is stuffed into a bag and suffers the effects of the Paralyse Magical Power; however, the effects will not immediately end should this model have no Will Points or be slain. If the model is still Paralysed at the end of the game, then they will count as slain and be removed as a casualty.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Roast 'em slowly
active_or_passive_rules.description: Instead of making Strikes, if he is within 6" of a Campfire, Bert may choose a single enemy model involved in the Combat. The chosen model is then placed in base contact with the Campfire and is immediately Set Ablaze.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Keep 'em for Later
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model wins a Duel Roll, they may choose a single enemy model on a 25mm base instead of making Strikes or using a Brutal Power Attack. The chosen model is stuffed into a bag and suffers the effects of the Paralyse Magical Power; however, the effects will not immediately end should this model have no Will Points or be slain. If the model is still Paralysed at the end of the game, then they will count as slain and be removed as a casualty.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mince 'em Fine
active_or_passive_rules.description: Instead of making Strikes, Bill may choose a single enemy model involved in the Combat. Bill and the chosen model both roll a D6 and add their respective Strength characteristics. If Bill scores higher after adding Strength characteristics, then the chosen model suffers a number of Wounds equal to the difference between the two scores.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chittering Hordes
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model may Support as if it had a spear, with the exception that they can only Support another model with this special rule. A model Supporting whilst using this special rule cannot also use a two-handed weapon in the same Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chittering Hordes
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model may Support as if it had a spear, with the exception that they can only Support another model with this special rule. A model Supporting whilst using this special rule cannot also use a two-handed weapon in the same Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Precious
active_or_passive_rules.description: If your opponent's Army contains a Ringbearer, then when Gollum Moves, he must always Charge the enemy Ringbearer if possible. Additionally, if Gollum kills the enemy Ringbearer in Combat, then he will automatically regain the One Ring - from that point onwards he counts as having it as part of his Wargear.

additional_text: Gollum has strong, strangling fingers and so is never considered to be Unarmed - ever! If your opponent does not have a Ringbearer in their Army, then Gollum carries the One Ring.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Swap with Me
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the Fight Phase, before the Declare Heroic Actions Step, Grinnah can choose a friendly Goblin model on a 25mm base within 3" and swap places with it. This does not count as Moving.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chittering Hordes
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model may Support as if it had a spear, with the exception that they can only Support another model with this special rule. A model Supporting whilst using this special rule cannot also use a two-handed weapon in the same Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Relentless Advance
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Goblin King may Move through friendly Goblin models when he Charges into Combat, though not when forced to Move by the effects of an enemy Magical Power or special rule. Each friendly Goblin model Moved through in this way immediately suffers a Strength 3 hit. The Goblin King may finish his Move overlapping friendly models, through any friendly models he finishes his Move overlapping will automatically be slain.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Goblin Projectile
active_or_passive_rules.description: During the Shoot Phase, if the Goblin King is in base contact with a friendly Goblin model and neither are Engaged in Combat, then the Goblin King can make a shooting attack - this has a range of 12" and counts as a throwing weapon. Remove the friendly Goblin model as a casualty, and then make the To Hit Roll and any In The Way Tests as normal. The shot is resolved at a Strength of 8, and any model that is hit will automatically be knocked Prone.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Blubbery Mass
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each time the Goblin King suffers a Wound, roll a D6. On a 3+ the Wound is prevented. Wounds caused by Magical Powers or Elven weapons in Combat ignore this special rule. Wounds caused by Elven missile weapons will cause the Goblin King to suffer a -1 penalty to this roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Immobile
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Goblin Scribe cannot Move, and will always count as Trapped should it lose a Duel Roll. Additionally, friendly models may carry the Goblin Scribe in which case it will count as a Heavy Object, and must always be put down after a model carrying it has finished its Move. In Scenarios where models Move onto the board, the Goblin Scribe may be carried on by friendly models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Always more where they came from
active_or_passive_rules.description: If the Goblin King declares a Heroic Move whilst within 6" of the Goblin Scribe and chooses to call With Me, then it will affect all friendly models on the battlefield rather than just those within 6', and affected models do not have to finish their Activation within 6" of the Goblin King. Additionally, any friendly Goblin Hero that begins their Activation within 3" of the Goblin Scribe can choose to spend a Might Point. If they do, the Goblin King regains a Might Point spent earlier in the battle. This rule can only be used once per turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Keep 'em for Later
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model wins a Duel Roll, they may choose a single enemy model on a 25mm base instead of making Strikes or using a Brutal Power Attack. The chosen model is stuffed into a bag and suffers the effects of the Paralyse Magical Power; however, the effects will not immediately end should this model have no Will Points or be slain. If the model is still Paralysed at the end of the game, then they will count as slain and be removed as a casualty.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lingering Cold
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of any Combat involving Tom, he may spend a Will Point to use this special rule. If he does, he may choose a single enemy model he is Engaged in Combat with. The chosen model immediately halves their Fight Value until the end of the turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Squash 'em into jelly
active_or_passive_rules.description: Instead of making Strikes, Tom may use this Brutal Power Attack. Each enemy model that was Engaged in Combat with Tom immediately suffers a Strength 6 hit and, if they survive, will be knocked Prone.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Troll Chain
active_or_passive_rules.description: A throwing weapon with Strength 5 and range 3'.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Troll Spear
active_or_passive_rules.description: A spear that deals 2 Wounds rather than 1 when rolling a natural 6 on the To Wound roll when making Strikes. This rule only applies when this model is not Supporting.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Fiery Lash
active_or_passive_rules.description: Throwing weapon with Strength 7, range 8. If the target is not slain and is not immune to fire-based attacks, it is pulled into base contact with the Balrog. For Cavalry, the whole model is dragged in this way. If the model cannot be placed in base contact, then it is not moved at all. Also, if the target is pulled into contact with other enemy models, it is not Engaged in Combat with them, only the Balrog.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Goblin Mastery
active_or_passive_rules.description: Moria Goblin models within 6" automatically pass Courage tests they are required to make.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Flame of Udun
active_or_passive_rules.description: If an enemy is Wounded, and not slain at the end of a Combat, roll a D6. On 6, the model is Set Ablaze, unless they are immune to fire-based attacks.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Demon of the Ancient World
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Balrog may declare a Heroic Combat each turn for free. Special rules or wargear that would slay the Balrog instantly (such as a Morgul Blade) will only inflict half of the Balrog's starting Wounds rather than all of them.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Many Tentacles
active_or_passive_rules.description: At 3 Wounds or less, Attack value becomes 3.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Water Dweller
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within any water, The Watcher is never slowed, can still Shoot, and always counts as rolling a 6 on the Swim Chart. Also increases Move value to 8" and gains Monstrous Charge.

active_or_passive_rules.name: From the Deep
active_or_passive_rules.description: Never part of another Hero's Warband and deploys in a special way. During each Priority, if you wish for The Watcher to arrive, roll a D6. On a 3+, place it anywhere on the board, but not in a way that will displace other models. The Watcher cannot Charge in a turn in which it arrives.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Grasping Tentacles
active_or_passive_rules.description: In the Shoot phase, The Watcher may make D6 shooting attacks, even in Engaged in Combat. These have Strength 3 and range 6", and never require In The Way rolls. It can still shoot whilst moving and never suffers the -1 penalty. Any target hit and not slain is placed in base contact with The Watcher. If the model cannot be placed in base contact, then it is not moved at all. Also, if the target is pulled into contact with other enemy models, it is not Engaged in Combat with them, only The Watcher.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dragged to the Depths
active_or_passive_rules.description: If within 6" of water, select a single enemy involved in the Combat and roll a D6. On a 2+, the model suffers a Wound, and if not prevented, will be immediately slain. The Watcher is then removed from the battlefield and its controlling player must roll to see if it arrives again in the same manner as described in the From the Deep special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Piercing Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: A model that is hit by the shot of a Ballista will be flung back D6" directly away from the Ballista if it has a Strength of 5 or lower. Any model that is passed over by the flung model suffers a Strength 5 hit and will be knocked Prone. If the flung model comes into contact with a piece of impassable terrain or a model with a Strength of 6 or higher, then it will stop and both the flung model and the model or piece of terrain that was hit will suffer one Strength 6 hit. After being flung back, the flung model will be knocked Prone if they survive. If after the model is flung back it would finish over other models and it has survived, then move the other models the minimum distance possible to allow the flung model to be placed where it has landed.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Bladed Bolts
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Corsair Ballista must re-roll To Wound Rolls of a 1, including against any model that suffers a Strength 6 hit caused by the model that is flung back, if applicable.

additional_text: Crewed by three Corsair Siege Crew, one of which is the Siege Veteran.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Commanding Bellow
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Corsair models treat a Corsair Bo'sun as a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Long-bladed Spear
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can be a spear or a two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Imposing Presence
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst mounted on the Royal War Mumak, the first time each turn an enemy model declares a Heroic move within 12", roll a D6. On a 4+, the action is cancelled and the Might point is lost. Measure the 12" range from the base of the Mumak.

active_or_passive_rules.name: High King of the South
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Mumak War Leader's Stand Fast is 12", and his warband may deploy within 12" of him rather than 6", and may be deployed outside of the Howdah. Measure the 12" range from the base of the Mumak.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Trample
active_or_passive_rules.description: When the Royal War Mumak Tramples, it will inflict 4 Strength 9 Impact Hits.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sigils of Defiance
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Royal War Mumak and any models in the Howdah gain Resistant to Magic, and whenever they suffer a Wound they may roll a D6. On a natural 6, the Wound is prevented.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Awesome Presence
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly models treat this model as a banner with a range of 6".

wargear: Tusks and huge stomping feet (hand weapons)

active_or_passive_rules.name: Trample
active_or_passive_rules.description: When a Mumak Tramples, it will inflict 3 Strength 9 Impact Hits.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Awesome Presence
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly models treat this model as a banner with a range of 6".

wargear: Tusks and huge stomping feet (hand weapons)

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mahud Beastmaster Chieftain
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Haradrim Commander is replaced by a Mahud Beastmaster Chieftain, which is placed on the forked wooden platform at the front of the Howdah.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lord of Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: If an enemy model in combat with Amdur declares a Heroic Strike, he may do the same for free. If he has already declared a Heroic Action, he may change his choice, but not regain the point of Might.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Herald of Victory
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Easterling models treat Amdur as a banner. If Amdur kills the enemy General, the range is increased to 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Durtuz the Silver Falchion
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven hand-and-a-half weapon. When making Strikes against an enemy Hero model, rolls of a natural 5+ will always Wound the target, regardless of the Hero model's Defence.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Infantry model with this rule loses a Combat, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Gleaming Horde
active_or_passive_rules.description: While mounted, gain the Shieldwall rule. The +1 Defence applies to both rider and mount. Hero models don't need a shield to benefit from this special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Easterling Halberd
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon can be used as either a pike or two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Infantry model with this rule loses a Combat, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Warriors of the Dragon Cult
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model may only be included in the Warband of a Black Dragon Hero. Additionally, whilst within 3" of a Black Dragon Hero, this model gains a bonus of +1 Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sorcerous Adept
active_or_passive_rules.description: Brorgir regains 1 Will point every time he rolls a natural 6 on Casting rolls, after resolving the effects of the Magical Power.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Easterling Halberd
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon can be used as either a pike or two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Supreme Agility
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gain a bonus of +2 to any Jump, Leap and Climb tests. Additionally, automatically passes all In The Way tests when striking a model defending a barrier or doorway.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Warriors of the Dragon Cult
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model may only be included in the Warband of a Black Dragon Hero. Additionally, whilst within 3" of a Black Dragon Hero, this model gains a bonus of +1 Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Shield of Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: can use the Shielding rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Infantry model with this rule loses a Combat, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Gleaming Horde
active_or_passive_rules.description: While mounted, gain the Shieldwall rule. The +1 Defence applies to both rider and mount. Hero models don't need a shield to benefit from this special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Knights of the Dragon Cult
active_or_passive_rules.description: May only include Black Dragon Warrior models in his warband.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Infantry model with this rule loses a Combat, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Gleaming Horde
active_or_passive_rules.description: While mounted, gain the Shieldwall rule. The +1 Defence applies to both rider and mount. Hero models don't need a shield to benefit from this special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Infantry model with this rule loses a Combat, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Gleaming Horde
active_or_passive_rules.description: While mounted, gain the Shieldwall rule. The +1 Defence applies to both rider and mount. Hero models don't need a shield to benefit from this special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Easterling Halberd
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon can be used as either a pike or two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Palanquin
active_or_passive_rules.description:
A Mount treated as a single Infantry model (not multiple single models). For any special rules or Magical Powers that affect either the rider or mount, the player using the special rule or Magical Power may choose either the Emperor or Palanquin to be affected. The movement range of the Palanquin will change depending on the remaining Wounds
Movement
3+ wounds - 6" move
2 wounds - 3" move
1 wound - no movement.
For shooting attacks, the shooter must take an In The Way test, where a roll of 1-4 will hit the Palanquin, and 5-6 will hit the Emperor. Models with the Sharpshooter special rule may still choose either the rider or mount as normal.
If the Emperor dismounts or is slain, replace the Palanquin with a number of Black Dragon Warriors with shield equal to the remaining Wounds. No Courage Tests are required for being a Separated Mount. The Palanquin cannot be knocked Prone, other than by a Direct Hit from a Siege Engine. It also cannot be affected by Hurl or Barge Brutal Powers, nor be forced back by Magical Powers, or be flung back by the effects of a Siege Engine.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Fighting from the Palanquin
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Emperor does not use any of the Palanquins characteristics, only his own. If the Emperor wins a Duel roll, and isn't using the Shielding rule, then after his Strikes are resolved the Palanquin may make a number of Strikes equal to its remaining Wounds. These Strikes cannot benefit from the target being Trapped, but the Emperor can improve them with his Might.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Standards of the Emperor
active_or_passive_rules.description: A banner with range 6". The Emperor never suffers the -1 penalty in his Duel roll for carrying a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: In the Name of the Dragon Emperor
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Easterling models within 6" of the Royal Palanquin and have line of sight to it, may re-roll To Wound rolls of a natural 1 when making Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Infantry model with this rule loses a Combat, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Show No Mercy
active_or_passive_rules.description: When making strikes against Trapped enemy models, you may re-roll failed To Wound rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Emperor's Glaive
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven spear, may use Shielding rule despite not having a shield.. May not support whilst mounted on Palanquin.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Emperor of the Easterlings
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Dragon Emperor's Stand Fast! has unlimited range, and affects Easterling Hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Helm of the Dragon Emperor
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Dragon Emperor gains the Resistant to Magic special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Infantry model with this rule loses a Combat, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Slow-acting Venom
active_or_passive_rules.description: Any model that suffers a wound from a War Drake which isn't prevented, and is not slain, reduces their Fight and Attack value by 1 (to a minimum of 1) for the remainder of the game. This effect does not stack on the same model between wounds from different War Drakes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pavise
active_or_passive_rules.description: A shield that provides +3 Defence, rather than +1. However, this model cannot gain this bonus whilst Engaged in Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Smoke Bombs
active_or_passive_rules.description: Throwing weapons with Strength 1. Any target hit, but not slain, must immediately spend a point of Will or suffer the effects of the Transfix Magical Power, and have their Fight value halved until the End Phase of the turn. If Dalamyr rolls a 1 on the To Hit roll, then he has run out of supply and cannot use smoke bombs again for the rest of the game.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Preternatural Agility
active_or_passive_rules.description: Dalamyr can never be Trapped whilst still standing.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Ruthless Commander
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Corsair Warrior models within 3" may re-roll a single dice during the Duel roll, after any other re-rolls from other sources have been used. However, if they use this bonus and still fail to win the Duel roll, they immediately suffer a Strength 2 hit. Only a single Corsair Warrior can use this special rule in each Combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Whip of the Masters
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each time a friendly Hero model within 6" attempts a Heroic Move, March or Shoot, roll a D6. On a 4+, the Hero does not spend the Might Point and the Heroic action is free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Preternatural Agility
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Hasharin can never be Trapped while still standing.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Serpent's Weapon
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the game, after both sides have deployed, secretly select one Hero model in the opponent's force to be Raza's target. If Raza is Engaged in Combat with this target, after any Heroic Actions have been resolved, reveal Raza's target. Raza gains a +2 bonus to his Fight value whilst Engaged in Combat with his target.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Serpent Banner
active_or_passive_rules.description: Banner with 6" range, and Suladan never suffers -1 penalty to Duel rolls whilst carrying it.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Ascendant
active_or_passive_rules.description: Suladan's Stand Fast! is 12" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Breathe Fire
active_or_passive_rules.description: This is treated as a bow with range 18". If the shot hits, the target and all models within 2" suffer a Strength 10 hit. Any model that suffers a Wound which is not prevented is slain, otherwise they are Set Ablaze. If a model is immune to fire-based based attacks, they are immune to this shooting attack.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Immovable Object
active_or_passive_rules.description: Cannot be knocked Prone, or forced to Move by Magic Powers and special rules. Smaug never counts as Trapped and never backs away - his opponent must always Back Away instead.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Desolator of the North
active_or_passive_rules.description: Smaug may spend a free Will point each turn. If it is not spent by the end of the turn, then the point is lost.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Missing Scale
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a model rolls a natural 6 on a shooting attack against Smaug, and the To Wound roll is also successful, he will suffer a number of Wounds equal to the strength of the missile weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: "I am fire, I am death"
active_or_passive_rules.description: Immune to fire-based attacks.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Colossal Frame
active_or_passive_rules.description: Enemies may still shoot Smaug even if he is Engaged in Combat. No In The Way test is required for friendly models he is Engaged in Combat with.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Unstoppable Momentum
active_or_passive_rules.description: Instead of making Strikes, Smaug can make a single Strength 9 hit on every model he is Engaged with.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Siege Ladder
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Siege Ladder is a Heavy Object, however, it is not mounted on a 25mm base and will simply use the template of the model when carried. If it is not being carried, a Siege Ladder can be shot at and attacked as normal; it counts as having a Defence of 8 and 2 Wounds. If any model that is carrying a Siege Ladder Moves into base contact with the walls of the fortress, the Siege Ladder is immediately raised; place it in position against the wall. Models may Move up a Siege Ladder in the same way as a normal ladder.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Siege Tower
active_or_passive_rules.description:
A Siege Tower should be tall enough for the ramp to reach the battlements of the fortress when lowered and should be no more than 4" wide across the ramp. Infantry models may be deployed within or on top of a Siege Tower, with the exception of Monster models. A Siege Tower can be pushed by friendly models, and will Move 6" when they do so. It requires six Infantry models to push a Siege Tower, with an additional Infantry model required for each model in or on the Siege Tower. Monster models count as six models for the purpose of pushing a Siege Tower. To count as pushing a Siege Tower, a model must be in base contact with either the rear or side of the Siege Tower, or in base contact with another model that is pushing from the rear.



If a Siege Tower moves into base contact with the fortress in the Move Phase, then the ramp is immediately lowered. Models in the Siege Tower do not count as Moving whilst the Siege Tower is being pushed, unless they specifically Move within it.



A Siege Tower can be shot at or attacked normally, has a Defence of 10 and 4 Wounds, and is a Battlefield Target. If a siege tower would be destroyed, all models in or on it will suffer Falling Damage.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Battering Ram
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Battering Ram is a Heavy Object, however, it is not mounted on a 25mm base and will simply use the template of the model when carried. If it is not being carried, a Battering Ram can be shot and attacked as normal; it counts as having a Defence of 8 and 3 Wounds. A Battering Ram must always have a minimum of two models carrying it, otherwise it cannot be carried.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Rallying Point
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Rallying Point is represented by a 25mm base. Models may Move over a Rallying Point but cannot finish their Move overlapping it. Defending models treat a Rallying Point as a Banner. Additionally, defending models within 6" of a Rallying Point apply a -1 modifier to any Courage Tests they are required to take. If, during the End phase of a turn, an enemy model is in base contact with a Rallying Point, that model hasn't done anything during that turn except Move (i.e. has not made a Shooting Attack, Cast a Magical Power, been Engaged in Combat), and that model was not affected by a Magical Power that turn, then it can destroy the Rallying Point - remove it from play.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Rocks
active_or_passive_rules.description: A pile of Rocks is represented by a 25mm base and is a Light Object. A defending model in base contact with the Rocks and in base contact with the battlements can make a Shooting Attack with them during the Shoot Phase. This Shooting Attack can only target enemy models within 1" of the walls or climbing a Siege Ladder, and has a range of 8". A model making a Shooting attack with a rock treats their Shoot value as 4+ regardless of its actual value. Any model hit by a rock suffers one Strength 6 hit. A model climbing a Siege Ladder that is hit must roll a D6, and on a 1-3 they will fall off and suffer Falling Damage.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Boiling Oil
active_or_passive_rules.description:
A vat of Boiling Oil is a Heavy Object and is represented by a 40mm base. If two defending models are in base contact with the Boiling Oil, and are not Engaged in combat, they can pour it on an attacker as a Shooting Attack. This Shooting Attack can only target enemy models within 1" of the walls, or climbing a Siege Ladder, and has a range of 4". Models making a shooting attack with Boiling Oil treat their Shoot value as 2+ regardless of its actual value. Any model hit by Boiling Oil suffers one Strength 8 hit, and any model (friend or foe) within 2" of the target suffers one Strength 4 hit. A model climbing a Siege Ladder that is hit must roll a D6, and on a 1-4 they will fall off and suffer Falling Damage.



After making a Shooting Attack with Boiling Oil, the defender rolls a D6. On a 1, the supply of oil has run dry and that vat of Boiling Oil cannot be used for the remainder of the game.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Barricade
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Barricade should be no more than 3" in length, 1" in width and 1" in height. A Barricade can be defended in the same way as a Barrier (see page 54), and can be jumped over in the same way as an Obstacle. A Barricade has a Defence of 7 and 2 Wounds.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Barricade
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Barricade should be no more than 3" in length, 1" in width and 1" in height. A Barricade can be defended in the same way as a Barrier (see page 54), and can be jumped over in the same way as an Obstacle. A Barricade has a Defence of 7 and 2 Wounds.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Spiked Barricade
active_or_passive_rules.description:
A Spiked Barricade follows all the rules for a regular Barricade, with the following additions:

- Any model that attempts to jump over a Spiked Barricade will suffer one Strength 3 hit after resolving their jump test, unless they rolled a 6.

- Any model that is fighting across a Spiked Barricade and accidentally Strikes it instead of their opponent immediately suffers one Strength 3 hit.
